Row.Text: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{1_FontIcon}{2_Desc}[ENDCOLOR] is this Ideology's preferred Ideological Value. Tenets that require this Value can be adopted regardless of your Social Policy choices.
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Your chosen Ideology or Ideological Values allow you to adopt this Tenet.[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your Ideological Values prevent you from adopting this Tenet.[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Your chosen Ideology or Ideological Values would allow you to adopt this Tenet.[ENDCOLOR]
[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Your Ideological Values would prevent you from adopting this Tenet.[ENDCOLOR]

[ICON_IDEOLOGY_AUTOCRACY] Authority Value: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{1_Num}%[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Your Social Policy choices determine the weighting of your Ideological Values, which in turn will determine the kinds of Ideological Tenets that you can adopt when you have access to an Ideology.

[ICON_IDEOLOGY_FREEDOM] Liberty Value: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{1_Num}%[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Your Social Policy choices determine the weighting of your Ideological Values, which in turn will determine the kinds of Ideological Tenets that you can adopt when you have access to an Ideology.

[ICON_IDEOLOGY_ORDER] Equality Value: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{1_Num}%[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Your Social Policy choices determine the weighting of your Ideological Values, which in turn will determine the kinds of Ideological Tenets that you can adopt when you have access to an Ideology.

[ICON_IDEOLOGY_AUTOCRACY] Authority Value: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{1_Num}%[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_IDEOLOGY_FREEDOM] Liberty Value: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{2_Num}%[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_IDEOLOGY_ORDER] Equality Value: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]{3_Num}%[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Your Social Policy choices determine the weighting of your Ideological Values, which in turn will determine the kinds of Ideological Tenets that you can adopt when you have access to an Ideology.
